list.name: Default
list.comment: Added bootstrap image classes during edit and submission of content instead of usinng jquery to do this which lagged the screen a bit

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
omitting db username/password. No longer in use....this uses the .env file
Fix for compiler input. Also added html purifer SUPER IMPORTANT to get rid of blatant XSS attacks
Updated navbar with current categories and tags. Also fixed wierd layout issue on homepage with filters near top. Main search actually goes somewhere now and loads old query.
FINALLY have the image upload working on the live media temple server after configured the php.ini file and giving absolute path to upload dir
Allow 'code' tags'
Fixed path
Added laravel sitemap generator and its working script in the routes file
Got the lightbox working with images on 'show' page. User can now click the image to see the blown-up view on the same page. Also limited max height on posts page
Fixed 'read more' link. Fixed upload zip link
Fixed incorrect tag name being displayed and sorted

- Updated <title> tag to include the actual post name and filter category. This is BIG for google to find it appropriately. - Deleted unused view files - Fixed auth error in model namespace (user model not found)
Fixed where related tags where also bringing up drafts
Fixed profile view
Added github link if contains
Fixed logo issue on smaller devices
Center align home message
Put the correct spacing inbetween each @section
Fixed body text not showing up correctly if user inserted an html markup letter such as an angle bracket in a for loop. This was fixed by ESCAPING the raw user input!
Added meta description to home page and about page
Fixed locatin of MOdels\posts
Added a bunch of meta stuff
Adding more seo stuff
More SEO
Fixed small bug
Allow table submissions using markdown
now allowing tables
Added 'commonmark-table-extension' so that markdown will support table syntax
changed favicon
Had to add more stuff to make the tables appear in markdown
Added table spacing
a little less padding
nvm, just add the default bootstrap table classes
Limit code pre tag height
Filtering now places high-number results first such as tags, cateogries, etc in sidebar
Navbar now shows up-to-date tag and category information
Made main image smaller size on posts listing. Also added main image to the sidebar on the 'showpost' page
Fixed dropdown arrow next to search box
Added slidebar to the right that contains recent posts and social icons. Also consolidated footer. New posts that are NOT from an admin are slated to be approved before showing up on main page.
- Added sidebar to main page - Added microcontroller to navbar - Added slidebar working now with footer pushed to bottom - Added "nothing found" on filter page
Fixed user draft profile
don't use the Auth() function here
Added linkedin icon
Added linkedin icon on slidebar and modified home page/sidebar slightly
Updated markdown editor to use "textarea" instesad of "div". Also increased post word count on min description
increase zip file size to 50MEG
Added ajax comments
Added bootstrap image classes during edit and submission of content instead of usinng jquery to do this which lagged the screen a bit
Adding blog stuff...still in the midst
Added cononical URLs and 'noindex' to some pages
